description: Initialisation based on observations. Atmospheric composition and/or emissions (and other conditions including volcanic aerosols) to follow prescribed SSP2-4.5 forcing scenario. Run each member for 5 years.
rationale: Effects of increased ensemble size. To reduce noise and improve skill

requirements.description: Run for at least 5 years, for use with a start date ensemble.
requirements.label: 5yrs

requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 4.5, future, 21st century, SSP2, RCP4.5
requirements.label: RCP45Forcing

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model or an Earth System Model
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, ESM, Atmosphere-Ocean, Earth System, Model, Configuration
requirements.label: AOGCM/ESM Configuration

requirements.description: A multi-ensemble with N initialisations for each start date in real time and ongoing.
requirements.keywords: ten, 10, initialisations, real-time, annual, start date ensemble
requirements.label: realTimeAnnualxN
